name: Escape: The Cabin
description:
Trapped, you must solve a variety of puzzles to find the key and escape!

Will you find the way out?

A SHORT EXPERIENCE!
On the train, bus or perhaps the loo? If you got some time to spare why not try see if you can escape this room.

FREE DOWNLOAD!
This game contains ads but only during menus so not to distract you from your escape!

HOW LONG IT TAKE YOU?
Once you find your way out, you'll see how long it took you to escape. Share on social media and see if your friends can beat you.
